attributes.action: Stop the blatant international sell-off of our football teams
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many football teams are being bought out by overseas investors for their own gain. This is causing those clubs to lose their identity and their support. It also has a knock-on effect on player prices and this then affects our ability as a nation to select a quality national team. Something must be done to prevent the foreign investors from ruining our national game and turning it into a freak show full of over-priced, foreign players.
